reviewText: Received the item in new condition and still in the shrink wrap. Gladly do business with them again. Received the item faster than I expected to receive it.

As a youth pastor for 13 years & a lead pastor for 5, I can honestly say I've never found a more Biblical, practical, and intensely applicable resource.  The DVD makes the truths of the book excessible to those who may never want to read a book on this topic, but hopefully will after they see this video.  I've used this in many different contexts and will continue to in the future.  I hope this tool is widely used to shape the minds of our youth and adults on this critical issue of eternal importance.  Submitted by Rebecca's husband- Todd
